title: Making molecular machines work
title_cn: 使分子机器工作
abstract: In this review we chart recent advances in what is at once an old and very new field of endeavour — the achievement of control of motion at the molecular level including solid-state and surface-mounted rotors, and its natural progression to the development of synthetic molecular machines. Besides a discussion of design principles used to control linear and rotary motion in such molecular systems, this review will address the advances towards the construction of synthetic machines that can perform useful functions. Approaches taken by several research groups to construct wholly synthetic molecular machines and devices are compared. This will be illustrated with molecular rotors, elevators, valves, transporters, muscles and other motor functions used to develop smart materials. The demonstration of molecular machinery is highlighted through recent examples of systems capable of effecting macroscopic movement through concerted molecular motion. Several approaches to illustrate how molecular motor systems have been used to accomplish work are discussed. We will conclude with prospects for future developments in this exciting field of nanotechnology.
abstract_cn: 在这篇评论中，我们以图表的形式总结了在古老而又新的努力领域中的最新进展。在固态和表面安装转子等分子水平上实现运动控制的成就，以及其向合成分子机器发展的自然发展。除了讨论用于控制此类分子系统中线性和旋转运动的设计原理外，本综述还将探讨可实现有用功能的合成机结构的发展。比较了几个研究小组采用的构建全合成分子机器和设备的方法。分子转子，升降机，阀门，运输工具，肌肉和其他用于开发智能材料的运动功能将对此进行说明。通过能够通过协调分子运动实现宏观运动的系统的最新实例，突出了分子机械的演示。讨论了几种说明分子马达系统如何用于完成工作的方法。我们将总结这个令人兴奋的纳米技术领域的未来发展前景。

title: Torsional electromechanical quantum oscillations in carbon nanotubes
title_cn: 碳纳米管中的扭转机电量子振荡
abstract: Carbon nanotubes can be distinctly metallic or semiconducting depending on their diameter and chirality. Here we show that continuously varying the chirality by mechanical torsion can induce conductance oscillations, which can be attributed to metal–semiconductor periodic transitions. The phenomenon is observed in multiwalled carbon nanotubes, where both the torque and the current are shown to be carried predominantly by the outermost wall. The oscillation period with torsion is consistent with the theoretical shifting of the corners of the first Brillouin zone of graphene across different sub-bands allowed in the nanotube. Beyond a critical torsion, the conductance irreversibly drops due to torsional failure, allowing us to determine the torsional strength of carbon nanotubes. Carbon nanotubes could be ideal torsional springs for nanoscopic pendulums, because electromechanical detection of motion could replace the microscopic detection techniques used at present. Our experiments indicate that carbon nanotubes could be used as electronic sensors of torsional motion in nanoelectromechanical systems.
abstract_cn: 碳纳米管取决于其直径和手性，可以是明显的金属或半导体。在这里，我们表明通过机械扭转连续改变手性可以诱导电导振荡，这可以归因于金属半导体的周期性跃迁。在多壁碳纳米管中观察到该现象，其中扭矩和电流均主要由最外壁承载。具有扭转的振荡周期与石墨烯的第一布里渊区的角在纳米管中允许的不同子带上的理论位移一致。除了临界扭转，电导由于扭转破坏而不可逆地下降，这使我们能够确定碳纳米管的扭转强度。碳纳米管可能是纳米摆的理想扭转弹簧，因为对运动的机电检测可以代替目前使用的微观检测技术。我们的实验表明，碳纳米管可用作纳米机电系统中扭转运动的电子传感器。</ p>

title: Giant piezoresistance effect in silicon nanowires
title_cn: 硅纳米线中的巨大压阻效应
abstract: The piezoresistance effect of silicon has been widely used in mechanical sensors, and is now being actively explored in order to improve the performance of silicon transistors. In fact, strain engineering is now considered to be one of the most promising strategies for developing high-performance sub-10-nm silicon devices. Interesting electromechanical properties have been observed in carbon nanotubes. In this paper we report that Si nanowires possess an unusually large piezoresistance effect compared with bulk. For example, the longitudinal piezoresistance coefficient along the 〈111〉 direction increases with decreasing diameter for p-type Si nanowires, reaching as high as −3,550 × 10−11 Pa–1, in comparison with a bulk value of −94 × 10−11 Pa−1. Strain-induced carrier mobility change and surface modifications have been shown to have clear influence on piezoresistance coefficients. This giant piezoresistance effect in Si nanowires may have significant implications in nanowire-based flexible electronics, as well as in nanoelectromechanical systems.
abstract_cn: 硅的压阻效应已广泛用于机械传感器中，目前正在积极探索以改善硅晶体管的性能。实际上，现在应变工程被认为是开发高性能亚10纳米以下硅器件的最有前途的策略之一。在碳纳米管中已经观察到有趣的机电性能。在本文中，我们报道了与纳米线相比，硅纳米线具有异常大的压阻效应。例如，沿＆＃12296; 111＆＃12297;的纵向压阻系数。 p型Si纳米线的直径方向随着直径的减小而增加，最高达到＆＃8722; 3,550＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 11 ＆＃160; Pa ＆＃8211; 1 ，而批量值为＆＃8722; 94＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 11 ＆＃160; Pa ＆＃8722; 1 。应变引起的载流子迁移率变化和表面改性已显示出对压阻系数的明显影响。 Si纳米线中巨大的压阻效应可能会对基于纳米线的柔性电子产品以及纳米机电系统产生重大影响。

title: A nanoplasmonic molecular ruler for measuring nuclease activity and DNA footprinting
title_cn: 用于测量核酸酶活性和DNA足迹的纳米等离子体分子标尺
abstract: Interactions between nucleic acids and proteins are essential to genetic information processing. The detection of size changes in nucleic acids is the key to mapping such interactions, and usually requires substrates with fluorescent, electrochemical or radioactive labels. Recently, methods have been developed to tether DNA to highly water-soluble Au nanoparticles, and nanoparticle pairs linked by DNA have been used to measure nanoscale distances. Here we demonstrate a molecular ruler in which double-stranded DNA is attached to a Au nanoparticle. The change in plasmon resonance wavelength of individual Au–DNA conjugates depends on the length of the DNA and can be measured with subnanometre axial resolution. An average wavelength shift of approximately 1.24 nm is observed per DNA base pair. This system allows for a label-free, quantitative, real-time measurement of nuclease activity and also serves as a new DNA footprinting platform, which can accurately detect and map the specific binding of a protein to DNA.
abstract_cn: 核酸和蛋白质之间的相互作用对于遗传信息处理至关重要。核酸大小变化的检测是绘制此类相互作用的关键，通常需要带有荧光，电化学或放射性标记的底物。近来，已经开发了将DNA束缚到高度水溶性的Au纳米颗粒的方法，并且通过DNA连接的纳米颗粒对已经用于测量纳米级距离。在这里，我们展示了一种分子标尺，其中双链DNA连接到Au纳米颗粒上。单个Au＆＃8211; DNA偶联物的等离振子共振波长的变化取决于DNA的长度，可以用亚纳米轴向分辨率测量。每个DNA碱基对观察到约1.24nm的平均波长偏移。该系统可实现无标记，定量，实时的核酸酶活性测量，并且还可以用作新的DNA足迹平台，该平台可以准确检测并绘制蛋白质与DNA的特异性结合。</ p>

title: Carbon nanotube superconducting quantum interference device
title_cn: 碳纳米管超导量子干涉装置
abstract: A superconducting quantum interference device (SQUID) with single-walled carbon nanotube (CNT) Josephson junctions is presented. Quantum confinement in each junction induces a discrete quantum dot (QD) energy level structure, which can be controlled with two lateral electrostatic gates. In addition, a backgate electrode can vary the transparency of the QD barriers, thus permitting change in the hybridization of the QD states with the superconducting contacts. The gates are also used to directly tune the quantum phase interference of the Cooper pairs circulating in the SQUID ring. Optimal modulation of the switching current with magnetic flux is achieved when both QD junctions are in the ‘on’ or ‘off’ state. In particular, the SQUID design establishes that these CNT Josephson junctions can be used as gate-controlled π-junctions; that is, the sign of the current–phase relation across the CNT junctions can be tuned with a gate voltage. The CNT-SQUIDs are sensitive local magnetometers, which are very promising for the study of magnetization reversal of an individual magnetic particle or molecule placed on one of the two CNT Josephson junctions.
abstract_cn: 提出了一种具有单壁碳纳米管（CNT）约瑟夫森结的超导量子干涉装置（SQUID）。每个结中的量子限制会产生离散的量子点（QD）能级结构，该结构可通过两个侧向静电门控制。另外，背栅电极可以改变QD势垒的透明度，从而允许改变QD状态与超导触点的混合。这些门还用于直接调节在SQUID环中循环的Cooper对的量子相位干扰。当两个QD结均在＆on;＃8217;中时，可以实现用磁通量对开关电流的最佳调制。或＆＃8216; off＆＃8217;州。特别地，SQUID设计确定了这些CNT Josephson结可以用作栅极控制的结。也就是说，可以用栅极电压调整CNT结两端的电流相位关系的符号。 CNT-SQUID是灵敏的局部磁力计，对于研究放置在两个CNT Josephson结之一上的单个磁性粒子或分子的磁化反转的研究非常有前途。</ p>

title: Sorting carbon nanotubes by electronic structure using density differentiation
title_cn: 使用密度微分通过电子结构分选碳纳米管
abstract: The heterogeneity of as-synthesized single-walled carbon nanotubes (SWNTs) precludes their widespread application in electronics, optics and sensing. We report on the sorting of carbon nanotubes by diameter, bandgap and electronic type using structure-discriminating surfactants to engineer subtle differences in their buoyant densities. Using the scalable technique of density-gradient ultracentrifugation, we have isolated narrow distributions of SWNTs in which >97% are within a 0.02-nm-diameter range. Furthermore, using competing mixtures of surfactants, we have produced bulk quantities of SWNTs of predominantly a single electronic type. These materials were used to fabricate thin-film electrical devices of networked SWNTs characterized by either metallic or semiconducting behaviour.
abstract_cn: 合成后的单壁碳纳米管（SWNT）的异质性使其无法广泛应用于电子，光学和传感领域。 我们报告了碳纳米管按直径，带隙和电子类型的排序，使用结构区分表面活性剂来设计其浮力密度的细微差别。 使用密度梯度超速离心的可扩展技术，我们分离出SWNT的窄分布，其中＞ 97％在0.02nm直径范围内。 此外，使用表面活性剂的竞争性混合物，我们已经生产了大部分单电子类型的单壁碳纳米管。 这些材料用于制造以金属或半导体行为为特征的联网单壁碳纳米管薄膜电子器件。

title: Linker-free directed assembly of high-performance integrated devices based on nanotubes and nanowires
title_cn: 基于纳米管和纳米线的高性能集成器件的无连接器定向组装
abstract: Advanced electronic devices based on carbon nanotubes (NTs) and various types of nanowires (NWs) could have a role in next-generation semiconductor architectures. However, the lack of a general fabrication method has held back the development of these devices for practical applications. Here we report an assembly strategy for devices based on NTs and NWs. Inert surface molecular patterns were used to direct the adsorption and alignment of NTs and NWs on bare surfaces to form device structures without the use of linker molecules. Substrate bias further enhanced the amount of NT and NW adsorption. Significantly, as all the processing steps can be performed with conventional microfabrication facilities, our method is readily accessible to the present semiconductor industry. We use this method to demonstrate large-scale assembly of NT- and NW-based integrated devices and their applications. We also provide extensive analysis regarding the reliability of the method.
abstract_cn: 基于碳纳米管（NT）和各种类型的纳米线（NW）的先进电子设备可能在下一代半导体体系结构中发挥作用。 然而，缺乏通用的制造方法阻碍了这些器件在实际应用中的发展。 在这里，我们报告基于NT和NW的设备的组装策略。 惰性表面分子图案用于指导NT和NW在裸露表面上的吸附和排列，以形成装置结构，而无需使用连接剂分子。 基板偏压进一步提高了NT和NW的吸附量。 重要的是，由于所有处理步骤都可以使用常规的微制造设备执行，因此我们的方法很容易为当前的半导体工业所采用。 我们使用这种方法来演示基于NT和NW的集成设备及其应用的大规模组装。 我们还提供了有关该方法可靠性的广泛分析。

title: Digital memory device based on tobacco mosaic virus conjugated with nanoparticles
title_cn: 基于烟草花叶病毒与纳米粒子结合的数字存储装置
abstract: Nanostructured viruses are attractive for use as templates for ordering quantum dots to make self-assembled building blocks for next-generation electronic devices. So far, only a few types of electronic devices have been fabricated from biomolecules due to the lack of charge transport through biomolecular junctions. Here, we show a novel electronic memory effect by incorporating platinum nanoparticles into tobacco mosaic virus. The memory effect is based on conductance switching, which leads to the occurrence of bistable states with an on/off ratio larger than three orders of magnitude. The mechanism of this process is attributed to charge trapping in the nanoparticles for data storage and a tunnelling process in the high conductance state. Such hybrid bio–inorganic nanostructures show promise for applications in future nanoelectronics.
abstract_cn: 纳米结构病毒很有吸引力，可以用作订购量子点的模板，以制造下一代电子设备的自组装构件。 迄今为止，由于缺乏通过生物分子结的电荷传输，因此仅由几种生物分子制造了几种类型的电子设备。 在这里，我们通过将铂纳米颗粒掺入烟草花叶病毒中展示了一种新型的电子记忆效应。 记忆效应基于电导切换，这会导致双稳态状态的开/关比大于三个数量级。 该过程的机理归因于电荷捕获在纳米颗粒中用于数据存储和高电导状态下的隧穿过程。 这种杂化的生物无机纳米结构显示了在未来纳米电子学中的应用前景。
